Python Code python
import requests import json import os import time import re from datetime import datetime as dt print('=== SEARCHING FOR NEVADO DEL RUIZ VOLCANIC EVENT AND ARCHBISHOP DISASTER RELIEF ===') print('Objective: Identify volcanic event causing 25-30% ice cap destabilization') print('Focus: Specific disaster, timing, and Archbishop leading relief efforts') print('=' * 80) # Create workspace directory if it doesn't exist if not os.path.exists('workspace'): os.makedirs('workspace') print('Created workspace directory') # Define comprehensive search keywords focusing on Nevado del Ruiz volcanic events search_keywords = [ 'Nevado del Ruiz volcanic eruption ice cap destabilization', 'Nevado del Ruiz 1985 eruption lahar disaster', 'Armero tragedy Nevado del Ruiz volcano', 'Nevado del Ruiz ice cap melting volcanic event', 'Archbishop disaster relief Nevado del Ruiz', 'Catholic Church Armero disaster relief', 'Nevado del Ruiz volcanic activity Colombia', 'lahar Nevado del Ruiz ice cap damage', 'volcanic eruption Colombia 1985 Archbishop', 'Nevado del Ruiz geological event ice destabilization' ] print(f'Search will focus on {len(search_keywords)} key terms related to Nevado del Ruiz volcanic events') def search_nevado_del_ruiz_information(): """Search for Nevado del Ruiz volcanic event and Archbishop disaster relief information""" # Headers for web requests headers = { 'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/91.0.4472.124 Safari/537.36', 'Accept-Language': 'en-US,en;q=0.9,es;q=0.8' } # Initial URLs to search - focusing on volcanic disaster and Colombian sources initial_urls = [ 'https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nevado_del_Ruiz', 'https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1985_Armero_tragedy', 'https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Armero_tragedy', 'https://es.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nevado_del_Ruiz', 'https://es.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tragedia_de_Armero', 'https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lahar' ] search_results = {} analysis_results = {} print(f'\nStarting web search of {len(initial_urls)} initial sources...') for i, url in enumerate(initial_urls, 1): page_name = url.split('/')[-1].replace('%20', '_') print(f'\n[{i}/{len(initial_urls)}] Fetching: {page_name}') print(f'URL: {url}') try: response = requests.get(url, headers=headers, timeout=30) response.raise_for_status() content = response.text # Simple text extraction using regex to avoid import issues # Remove script and style content content = re.sub(r'<script.*?</script>', '', content, flags=re.DOTALL | re.IGNORECASE) content = re.sub(r'<style.*?</style>', '', content, flags=re.DOTALL | re.IGNORECASE) # Remove HTML tags clean_text = re.sub(r'<[^>]+>', '', content) # Clean up whitespace clean_text = re.sub(r'\s+', ' ', clean_text).strip() search_results[page_name] = { 'url': url, 'content_length': len(clean_text), 'content': clean_text[:25000], # Store first 25000 characters 'fetch_time': dt.now().isoformat(), 'status': 'success' } print(f'✓ Successfully retrieved {len(clean_text):,} characters') # Analyze content for keywords immediately found_keywords = [] relevant_sections = [] volcanic_events = [] archbishop_mentions = [] content_lower = clean_text.lower() # Look for volcanic event details volcanic_indicators = ['eruption', 'lahar', 'ice cap', 'destabilization', '25%', '30%', 'melting', 'volcanic activity'] for indicator in volcanic_indicators: if indicator in content_lower: # Find sections around indicator start_pos = 0 indicator_count = 0 while True: pos = content_lower.find(indicator, start_pos) if pos == -1: break # Extract context around indicator section_start = max(0, pos - 600) section_end = min(len(clean_text), pos + 600) section = clean_text[section_start:section_end] volcanic_events.append({ 'indicator': indicator, 'section': section, 'position': pos }) start_pos = pos + 1 indicator_count += 1 if indicator_count >= 2: # Limit to 2 occurrences per indicator break # Look for Archbishop and disaster relief mentions religious_indicators = ['archbishop', 'cardinal', 'bishop', 'catholic', 'church', 'relief', 'disaster relief', 'humanitarian'] for indicator in religious_indicators: if indicator in content_lower: start_pos = 0 indicator_count = 0 while True: pos = content_lower.find(indicator, start_pos) if pos == -1: break section_start = max(0, pos - 500) section_end = min(len(clean_text), pos + 500) section = clean_text[section_start:section_end] archbishop_mentions.append({ 'indicator': indicator, 'section': section, 'position': pos }) start_pos = pos + 1 indicator_count += 1 if indicator_count >= 2: # Limit to 2 occurrences per indicator break # Check for search keywords for keyword in search_keywords: if keyword.lower() in content_lower: found_keywords.append(keyword) # Find sections around keyword keyword_lower = keyword.lower() pos = content_lower.find(keyword_lower) if pos != -1: section_start = max(0, pos - 700) section_end = min(len(clean_text), pos + 700) section = clean_text[section_start:section_end] relevant_sections.append({ 'keyword': keyword, 'section': section, 'position': pos }) analysis_results[page_name] = { 'url': url, 'found_keywords': found_keywords, 'relevant_sections': relevant_sections, 'volcanic_events': volcanic_events, 'archbishop_mentions': archbishop_mentions, 'keyword_count': len(found_keywords), 'volcanic_events_count': len(volcanic_events), 'archbishop_mentions_count': len(archbishop_mentions) } print(f'✓ Found {len(found_keywords)} keywords, {len(volcanic_events)} volcanic events, {len(archbishop_mentions)} religious mentions') if found_keywords: keyword_preview = ', '.join(found_keywords[:3]) ellipsis = '...' if len(found_keywords) > 3 else '' print(f'Keywords: {keyword_preview}{ellipsis}') except Exception as e: print(f'✗ Error fetching {url}: {str(e)}') search_results[page_name] = { 'url': url, 'error': str(e), 'content_length': 0, 'content': '', 'fetch_time': dt.now().isoformat(), 'status': 'error' } analysis_results[page_name] = { 'url': url, 'found_keywords': [], 'relevant_sections': [], 'volcanic_events': [], 'archbishop_mentions': [], 'keyword_count': 0, 'volcanic_events_count': 0, 'archbishop_mentions_count': 0, 'error': str(e) } # Add delay between requests to be respectful time.sleep(2) return search_results, analysis_results # Execute the search print('Starting comprehensive web search for Nevado del Ruiz volcanic event and Archbishop disaster relief...') search_results, analysis_results = search_nevado_del_ruiz_information() print(f'\n{"="*80}') print('INITIAL SEARCH COMPLETED') print(f'{"="*80}') # Save initial search results initial_output_file = 'workspace/nevado_del_ruiz_initial_search.json' with open(initial_output_file, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f: json.dump(analysis_results, f, indent=2, ensure_ascii=False) print(f'\nInitial search results saved to {initial_output_file}') # Generate search summary search_summary = { 'search_date': dt.now().isoformat(), 'urls_searched': len(search_results), 'successful_fetches': len([r for r in search_results.values() if r.get('status') == 'success']), 'failed_fetches': len([r for r in search_results.values() if r.get('status') == 'error']), 'total_keywords_found': sum(r.get('keyword_count', 0) for r in analysis_results.values()), 'total_volcanic_events': sum(r.get('volcanic_events_count', 0) for r in analysis_results.values()), 'total_archbishop_mentions': sum(r.get('archbishop_mentions_count', 0) for r in analysis_results.values()) } print(f'\nINITIAL SEARCH SUMMARY:') print(f'URLs searched: {search_summary["urls_searched"]}') print(f'Successful fetches: {search_summary["successful_fetches"]}') print(f'Failed fetches: {search_summary["failed_fetches"]}') print(f'Total keywords found: {search_summary["total_keywords_found"]}') print(f'Total volcanic events: {search_summary["total_volcanic_events"]}') print(f'Total Archbishop mentions: {search_summary["total_archbishop_mentions"]}') # Display results by page print(f'\n{"="*80}') print('INITIAL SEARCH RESULTS BY PAGE') print(f'{"="*80}') for page_name, results in analysis_results.items(): if results.get('keyword_count', 0) > 0 or results.get('volcanic_events_count', 0) > 0: print(f'\n📄 {page_name}') print(f' URL: {results["url"]}') if results.get('found_keywords'): keyword_list = ', '.join(results['found_keywords'][:3]) print(f' Keywords found ({results["keyword_count"]}): {keyword_list}') print(f' Volcanic events: {results["volcanic_events_count"]}') print(f' Archbishop mentions: {results["archbishop_mentions_count"]}') elif 'error' in results: print(f'\n❌ {page_name} - Error: {results["error"]}') else: print(f'\n⚪ {page_name} - No relevant content found') print(f'\n{"="*80}') print('ANALYZING CONTENT FOR SPECIFIC VOLCANIC EVENT AND ARCHBISHOP DETAILS') print(f'{"="*80}') # Look for specific patterns related to the volcanic event and Archbishop eruption_details = [] ice_cap_damage = [] archbishop_relief = [] disaster_timeline = [] for page_name, results in analysis_results.items(): # Analyze volcanic events for event in results.get('volcanic_events', []): event_text = event['section'].lower() event_content = event['section'] # Look for 1985 eruption details if '1985' in event_text and ('eruption' in event_text or 'lahar' in event_text): eruption_details.append({ 'source': page_name, 'section': event_content, 'indicator': event['indicator'], 'url': results['url'] }) # Look for ice cap damage percentages if any(term in event_text for term in ['25%', '30%', 'ice cap', 'destabilization', 'melting']): ice_cap_damage.append({ 'source': page_name, 'section': event_content, 'indicator': event['indicator'], 'url': results['url'] }) # Analyze Archbishop mentions for mention in results.get('archbishop_mentions', []): mention_text = mention['section'].lower() mention_content = mention['section'] # Look for disaster relief activities if any(term in mention_text for term in ['relief', 'disaster', 'humanitarian', 'aid', 'help']): archbishop_relief.append({ 'source': page_name, 'section': mention_content, 'indicator': mention['indicator'], 'url': results['url'] }) # Look for timeline information if any(term in mention_text for term in ['1985', 'november', 'armero', 'nevado']): disaster_timeline.append({ 'source': page_name, 'section': mention_content, 'indicator': mention['indicator'], 'url': results['url'] }) # Display findings print(f'\n🌋 ERUPTION DETAILS: {len(eruption_details)}') for i, detail in enumerate(eruption_details[:3], 1): print(f'\n{i}. From {detail["source"]}: ({detail["indicator"]})') print(f' {detail["section"][:400]}...') print(f'\n🧊 ICE CAP DAMAGE: {len(ice_cap_damage)}') for i, damage in enumerate(ice_cap_damage[:3], 1): print(f'\n{i}. From {damage["source"]}: ({damage["indicator"]})') print(f' {damage["section"][:400]}...') print(f'\n⛪ ARCHBISHOP RELIEF: {len(archbishop_relief)}') for i, relief in enumerate(archbishop_relief[:3], 1): print(f'\n{i}. From {relief["source"]}: ({relief["indicator"]})') print(f' {relief["section"][:400]}...') print(f'\n📅 DISASTER TIMELINE: {len(disaster_timeline)}') for i, timeline in enumerate(disaster_timeline[:3], 1): print(f'\n{i}. From {timeline["source"]}: ({timeline["indicator"]})') print(f' {timeline["section"][:400]}...') # Save comprehensive findings comprehensive_findings = { 'search_date': dt.now().isoformat(), 'search_summary': search_summary, 'eruption_details': eruption_details, 'ice_cap_damage': ice_cap_damage, 'archbishop_relief': archbishop_relief, 'disaster_timeline': disaster_timeline, 'search_keywords': search_keywords, 'pages_analyzed': list(analysis_results.keys()) } findings_file = 'workspace/nevado_del_ruiz_comprehensive_findings.json' with open(findings_file, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f: json.dump(comprehensive_findings, f, indent=2, ensure_ascii=False) print(f'\nComprehensive findings saved to {findings_file}') print(f'\n{"="*80}') print('INITIAL SEARCH PHASE COMPLETED - ANALYZING KEY FINDINGS') print(f'{"="*80}') print(f'\n📊 Initial Search Statistics:') print(f' • Pages searched: {len(analysis_results)}') print(f' • Eruption details found: {len(eruption_details)}') print(f' • Ice cap damage references: {len(ice_cap_damage)}') print(f' • Archbishop relief mentions: {len(archbishop_relief)}') print(f' • Timeline references: {len(disaster_timeline)}') print(f'\n🎯 KEY FINDINGS PREVIEW:') if eruption_details: print(f' • Volcanic eruption information identified') if ice_cap_damage: print(f' • Ice cap destabilization data found') if archbishop_relief: print(f' • Archbishop disaster relief activities documented') if disaster_timeline: print(f' • Timeline information available') print(f'\n✅ INITIAL SEARCH COMPLETED SUCCESSFULLY!') print(f'\n📁 FILES CREATED:') print(f' • {initial_output_file} (Raw search analysis)') print(f' • {findings_file} (Comprehensive findings)')
Execution Output
Code Output: === SEARCHING FOR NEVADO DEL RUIZ VOLCANIC EVENT AND ARCHBISHOP DISASTER RELIEF === Objective: Identify volcanic event causing 25-30% ice cap destabilization Focus: Specific disaster, timing, and Archbishop leading relief efforts ================================================================================ Search will focus on 10 key terms related to Nevado del Ruiz volcanic events Starting comprehensive web search for Nevado del Ruiz volcanic event and Archbishop disaster relief... Starting web search of 6 initial sources... [1/6] Fetching: Nevado_del_Ruiz URL: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nevado_del_Ruiz ✗ Error fetching https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nevado_del_Ruiz: name 'dt' is not defined Execution error: NameError: name 'dt' is not defined Error/Warning: Traceback (most recent call last): File "<string>", line 81, in search_nevado_del_ruiz_information NameError: name 'dt' is not defined During handling of the above exception, another exception occurred: Traceback (most recent call last): File "/Users/xushiyue.6/codes/EvolAgent/src/utils/interpreter.py", line 367, in interpret_code exec(code, execution_globals, {}) # 使用独立的 locals ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ File "<string>", line 214, in <module> File "<string>", line 192, in search_nevado_del_ruiz_information NameError: name 'dt' is not defined
tester
2025-08-13 00:26:48
Tester Feedback
Tester Feedback:
Execution failed - NameError: name 'dt' is not defined on line 81 in the search function. The code imported datetime correctly but used an undefined alias 'dt' instead of the imported 'datetime'. This prevented the web search from executing and retrieving any information about the Nevado del Ruiz volcanic event or Archbishop disaster relief efforts. **PLAN** alignment: 0% - no search was conducted, no volcanic event data retrieved, and no information obtained about ice cap destabilization percentages or Archbishop involvement due to the undefined variable error. Recommended fix: Replace all instances of 'dt.now()' with 'datetime.now()' throughout the code, or add 'as dt' to the import statement. The search strategy targeting Wikipedia pages about Nevado del Ruiz and the 1985 Armero tragedy is sound for finding the required information about the volcanic event and religious disaster response.
Python Code python
import requests import json import os import time import re from datetime import datetime as dt print('=== SEARCHING FOR NEVADO DEL RUIZ VOLCANIC EVENT AND ARCHBISHOP DISASTER RELIEF ===') print('Objective: Identify volcanic event causing 25-30% ice cap destabilization') print('Focus: Specific disaster, timing, and Archbishop leading relief efforts') print('=' * 80) # Create workspace directory if it doesn't exist if not os.path.exists('workspace'): os.makedirs('workspace') print('Created workspace directory') # Define comprehensive search keywords focusing on Nevado del Ruiz volcanic events search_keywords = [ 'Nevado del Ruiz volcanic eruption ice cap destabilization', 'Nevado del Ruiz 1985 eruption lahar disaster', 'Armero tragedy Nevado del Ruiz volcano', 'Nevado del Ruiz ice cap melting volcanic event', 'Archbishop disaster relief Nevado del Ruiz', 'Catholic Church Armero disaster relief', 'Nevado del Ruiz volcanic activity Colombia', 'lahar Nevado del Ruiz ice cap damage', 'volcanic eruption Colombia 1985 Archbishop', 'Nevado del Ruiz geological event ice destabilization' ] print(f'Search will focus on {len(search_keywords)} key terms related to Nevado del Ruiz volcanic events') def search_nevado_del_ruiz_information(): """Search for Nevado del Ruiz volcanic event and Archbishop disaster relief information""" # Headers for web requests headers = { 'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/91.0.4472.124 Safari/537.36', 'Accept-Language': 'en-US,en;q=0.9,es;q=0.8' } # Initial URLs to search - focusing on volcanic disaster and Colombian sources initial_urls = [ 'https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nevado_del_Ruiz', 'https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1985_Armero_tragedy', 'https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Armero_tragedy', 'https://es.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nevado_del_Ruiz', 'https://es.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tragedia_de_Armero', 'https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lahar' ] search_results = {} analysis_results = {} print(f'\nStarting web search of {len(initial_urls)} initial sources...') for i, url in enumerate(initial_urls, 1): page_name = url.split('/')[-1].replace('%20', '_') print(f'\n[{i}/{len(initial_urls)}] Fetching: {page_name}') print(f'URL: {url}') try: response = requests.get(url, headers=headers, timeout=30) response.raise_for_status() content = response.text # Simple text extraction using regex to avoid import issues # Remove script and style content content = re.sub(r'<script.*?</script>', '', content, flags=re.DOTALL | re.IGNORECASE) content = re.sub(r'<style.*?</style>', '', content, flags=re.DOTALL | re.IGNORECASE) # Remove HTML tags clean_text = re.sub(r'<[^>]+>', '', content) # Clean up whitespace clean_text = re.sub(r'\s+', ' ', clean_text).strip() search_results[page_name] = { 'url': url, 'content_length': len(clean_text), 'content': clean_text[:25000], # Store first 25000 characters 'fetch_time': dt.now().isoformat(), 'status': 'success' } print(f'✓ Successfully retrieved {len(clean_text):,} characters') # Analyze content for keywords immediately found_keywords = [] relevant_sections = [] volcanic_events = [] archbishop_mentions = [] content_lower = clean_text.lower() # Look for volcanic event details volcanic_indicators = ['eruption', 'lahar', 'ice cap', 'destabilization', '25%', '30%', 'melting', 'volcanic activity'] for indicator in volcanic_indicators: if indicator in content_lower: # Find sections around indicator start_pos = 0 indicator_count = 0 while True: pos = content_lower.find(indicator, start_pos) if pos == -1: break # Extract context around indicator section_start = max(0, pos - 600) section_end = min(len(clean_text), pos + 600) section = clean_text[section_start:section_end] volcanic_events.append({ 'indicator': indicator, 'section': section, 'position': pos }) start_pos = pos + 1 indicator_count += 1 if indicator_count >= 2: # Limit to 2 occurrences per indicator break # Look for Archbishop and disaster relief mentions religious_indicators = ['archbishop', 'cardinal', 'bishop', 'catholic', 'church', 'relief', 'disaster relief', 'humanitarian'] for indicator in religious_indicators: if indicator in content_lower: start_pos = 0 indicator_count = 0 while True: pos = content_lower.find(indicator, start_pos) if pos == -1: break section_start = max(0, pos - 500) section_end = min(len(clean_text), pos + 500) section = clean_text[section_start:section_end] archbishop_mentions.append({ 'indicator': indicator, 'section': section, 'position': pos }) start_pos = pos + 1 indicator_count += 1 if indicator_count >= 2: # Limit to 2 occurrences per indicator break # Check for search keywords for keyword in search_keywords: if keyword.lower() in content_lower: found_keywords.append(keyword) # Find sections around keyword keyword_lower = keyword.lower() pos = content_lower.find(keyword_lower) if pos != -1: section_start = max(0, pos - 700) section_end = min(len(clean_text), pos + 700) section = clean_text[section_start:section_end] relevant_sections.append({ 'keyword': keyword, 'section': section, 'position': pos }) analysis_results[page_name] = { 'url': url, 'found_keywords': found_keywords, 'relevant_sections': relevant_sections, 'volcanic_events': volcanic_events, 'archbishop_mentions': archbishop_mentions, 'keyword_count': len(found_keywords), 'volcanic_events_count': len(volcanic_events), 'archbishop_mentions_count': len(archbishop_mentions) } print(f'✓ Found {len(found_keywords)} keywords, {len(volcanic_events)} volcanic events, {len(archbishop_mentions)} religious mentions') if found_keywords: keyword_preview = ', '.join(found_keywords[:3]) ellipsis = '...' if len(found_keywords) > 3 else '' print(f'Keywords: {keyword_preview}{ellipsis}') except Exception as e: print(f'✗ Error fetching {url}: {str(e)}') search_results[page_name] = { 'url': url, 'error': str(e), 'content_length': 0, 'content': '', 'fetch_time': dt.now().isoformat(), 'status': 'error' } analysis_results[page_name] = { 'url': url, 'found_keywords': [], 'relevant_sections': [], 'volcanic_events': [], 'archbishop_mentions': [], 'keyword_count': 0, 'volcanic_events_count': 0, 'archbishop_mentions_count': 0, 'error': str(e) } # Add delay between requests to be respectful time.sleep(2) return search_results, analysis_results # Execute the search print('Starting comprehensive web search for Nevado del Ruiz volcanic event and Archbishop disaster relief...') search_results, analysis_results = search_nevado_del_ruiz_information() print(f'\n{"="*80}') print('INITIAL SEARCH COMPLETED') print(f'{"="*80}') # Save initial search results initial_output_file = 'workspace/nevado_del_ruiz_initial_search.json' with open(initial_output_file, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f: json.dump(analysis_results, f, indent=2, ensure_ascii=False) print(f'\nInitial search results saved to {initial_output_file}') # Generate search summary search_summary = { 'search_date': dt.now().isoformat(), 'urls_searched': len(search_results), 'successful_fetches': len([r for r in search_results.values() if r.get('status') == 'success']), 'failed_fetches': len([r for r in search_results.values() if r.get('status') == 'error']), 'total_keywords_found': sum(r.get('keyword_count', 0) for r in analysis_results.values()), 'total_volcanic_events': sum(r.get('volcanic_events_count', 0) for r in analysis_results.values()), 'total_archbishop_mentions': sum(r.get('archbishop_mentions_count', 0) for r in analysis_results.values()) } print(f'\nINITIAL SEARCH SUMMARY:') print(f'URLs searched: {search_summary["urls_searched"]}') print(f'Successful fetches: {search_summary["successful_fetches"]}') print(f'Failed fetches: {search_summary["failed_fetches"]}') print(f'Total keywords found: {search_summary["total_keywords_found"]}') print(f'Total volcanic events: {search_summary["total_volcanic_events"]}') print(f'Total Archbishop mentions: {search_summary["total_archbishop_mentions"]}') # Display results by page print(f'\n{"="*80}') print('INITIAL SEARCH RESULTS BY PAGE') print(f'{"="*80}') for page_name, results in analysis_results.items(): if results.get('keyword_count', 0) > 0 or results.get('volcanic_events_count', 0) > 0: print(f'\n📄 {page_name}') print(f' URL: {results["url"]}') if results.get('found_keywords'): keyword_list = ', '.join(results['found_keywords'][:3]) print(f' Keywords found ({results["keyword_count"]}): {keyword_list}') print(f' Volcanic events: {results["volcanic_events_count"]}') print(f' Archbishop mentions: {results["archbishop_mentions_count"]}') elif 'error' in results: print(f'\n❌ {page_name} - Error: {results["error"]}') else: print(f'\n⚪ {page_name} - No relevant content found') print(f'\n{"="*80}') print('ANALYZING CONTENT FOR SPECIFIC VOLCANIC EVENT AND ARCHBISHOP DETAILS') print(f'{"="*80}') # Look for specific patterns related to the volcanic event and Archbishop eruption_details = [] ice_cap_damage = [] archbishop_relief = [] disaster_timeline = [] for page_name, results in analysis_results.items(): # Analyze volcanic events for event in results.get('volcanic_events', []): event_text = event['section'].lower() event_content = event['section'] # Look for 1985 eruption details if '1985' in event_text and ('eruption' in event_text or 'lahar' in event_text): eruption_details.append({ 'source': page_name, 'section': event_content, 'indicator': event['indicator'], 'url': results['url'] }) # Look for ice cap damage percentages if any(term in event_text for term in ['25%', '30%', 'ice cap', 'destabilization', 'melting']): ice_cap_damage.append({ 'source': page_name, 'section': event_content, 'indicator': event['indicator'], 'url': results['url'] }) # Analyze Archbishop mentions for mention in results.get('archbishop_mentions', []): mention_text = mention['section'].lower() mention_content = mention['section'] # Look for disaster relief activities if any(term in mention_text for term in ['relief', 'disaster', 'humanitarian', 'aid', 'help']): archbishop_relief.append({ 'source': page_name, 'section': mention_content, 'indicator': mention['indicator'], 'url': results['url'] }) # Look for timeline information if any(term in mention_text for term in ['1985', 'november', 'armero', 'nevado']): disaster_timeline.append({ 'source': page_name, 'section': mention_content, 'indicator': mention['indicator'], 'url': results['url'] }) # Display findings print(f'\n🌋 ERUPTION DETAILS: {len(eruption_details)}') for i, detail in enumerate(eruption_details[:3], 1): print(f'\n{i}. From {detail["source"]}: ({detail["indicator"]})') print(f' {detail["section"][:400]}...') print(f'\n🧊 ICE CAP DAMAGE: {len(ice_cap_damage)}') for i, damage in enumerate(ice_cap_damage[:3], 1): print(f'\n{i}. From {damage["source"]}: ({damage["indicator"]})') print(f' {damage["section"][:400]}...') print(f'\n⛪ ARCHBISHOP RELIEF: {len(archbishop_relief)}') for i, relief in enumerate(archbishop_relief[:3], 1): print(f'\n{i}. From {relief["source"]}: ({relief["indicator"]})') print(f' {relief["section"][:400]}...') print(f'\n📅 DISASTER TIMELINE: {len(disaster_timeline)}') for i, timeline in enumerate(disaster_timeline[:3], 1): print(f'\n{i}. From {timeline["source"]}: ({timeline["indicator"]})') print(f' {timeline["section"][:400]}...') # Save comprehensive findings comprehensive_findings = { 'search_date': dt.now().isoformat(), 'search_summary': search_summary, 'eruption_details': eruption_details, 'ice_cap_damage': ice_cap_damage, 'archbishop_relief': archbishop_relief, 'disaster_timeline': disaster_timeline, 'search_keywords': search_keywords, 'pages_analyzed': list(analysis_results.keys()) } findings_file = 'workspace/nevado_del_ruiz_comprehensive_findings.json' with open(findings_file, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f: json.dump(comprehensive_findings, f, indent=2, ensure_ascii=False) print(f'\nComprehensive findings saved to {findings_file}') print(f'\n{"="*80}') print('INITIAL SEARCH PHASE COMPLETED - ANALYZING KEY FINDINGS') print(f'{"="*80}') print(f'\n📊 Initial Search Statistics:') print(f' • Pages searched: {len(analysis_results)}') print(f' • Eruption details found: {len(eruption_details)}') print(f' • Ice cap damage references: {len(ice_cap_damage)}') print(f' • Archbishop relief mentions: {len(archbishop_relief)}') print(f' • Timeline references: {len(disaster_timeline)}') print(f'\n🎯 KEY FINDINGS PREVIEW:') if eruption_details: print(f' • Volcanic eruption information identified') if ice_cap_damage: print(f' • Ice cap destabilization data found') if archbishop_relief: print(f' • Archbishop disaster relief activities documented') if disaster_timeline: print(f' • Timeline information available') print(f'\n✅ INITIAL SEARCH COMPLETED SUCCESSFULLY!') print(f'\n📁 FILES CREATED:') print(f' • {initial_output_file} (Raw search analysis)') print(f' • {findings_file} (Comprehensive findings)')
Execution Output
Code Output: === SEARCHING FOR NEVADO DEL RUIZ VOLCANIC EVENT AND ARCHBISHOP DISASTER RELIEF === Objective: Identify volcanic event causing 25-30% ice cap destabilization Focus: Specific disaster, timing, and Archbishop leading relief efforts ================================================================================ Search will focus on 10 key terms related to Nevado del Ruiz volcanic events Starting comprehensive web search for Nevado del Ruiz volcanic event and Archbishop disaster relief... Starting web search of 6 initial sources... [1/6] Fetching: Nevado_del_Ruiz URL: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nevado_del_Ruiz ✗ Error fetching https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nevado_del_Ruiz: name 'dt' is not defined Execution error: NameError: name 'dt' is not defined Error/Warning: Traceback (most recent call last): File "<string>", line 81, in search_nevado_del_ruiz_information NameError: name 'dt' is not defined During handling of the above exception, another exception occurred: Traceback (most recent call last): File "/Users/xushiyue.6/codes/EvolAgent/src/utils/interpreter.py", line 367, in interpret_code exec(code, execution_globals, {}) # 使用独立的 locals ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ File "<string>", line 214, in <module> File "<string>", line 192, in search_nevado_del_ruiz_information NameError: name 'dt' is not defined
developer
2025-08-13 00:27:57
Code Execution - Plan #1 (Iteration 6)
Executing development phase code:
Python Code python
import requests import json import os import time import re from datetime import datetime print('=== SEARCHING FOR NEVADO DEL RUIZ VOLCANIC EVENT AND ARCHBISHOP DISASTER RELIEF ===') print('Objective: Identify volcanic event causing 25-30% ice cap destabilization') print('Focus: Specific disaster, timing, and Archbishop leading relief efforts') print('=' * 80) # Create workspace directory if it doesn't exist if not os.path.exists('workspace'): os.makedirs('workspace') print('Created workspace directory') # Define comprehensive search keywords focusing on Nevado del Ruiz volcanic events search_keywords = [ 'Nevado del Ruiz volcanic eruption ice cap destabilization', 'Nevado del Ruiz 1985 eruption lahar disaster', 'Armero tragedy Nevado del Ruiz volcano', 'Nevado del Ruiz ice cap melting volcanic event', 'Archbishop disaster relief Nevado del Ruiz', 'Catholic Church Armero disaster relief', 'Nevado del Ruiz volcanic activity Colombia', 'lahar Nevado del Ruiz ice cap damage', 'volcanic eruption Colombia 1985 Archbishop', 'Nevado del Ruiz geological event ice destabilization' ] print(f'Search will focus on {len(search_keywords)} key terms related to Nevado del Ruiz volcanic events') def search_nevado_del_ruiz_information(): """Search for Nevado del Ruiz volcanic event and Archbishop disaster relief information""" # Headers for web requests headers = { 'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/91.0.4472.124 Safari/537.36', 'Accept-Language': 'en-US,en;q=0.9,es;q=0.8' } # Initial URLs to search - focusing on volcanic disaster and Colombian sources initial_urls = [ 'https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nevado_del_Ruiz', 'https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1985_Armero_tragedy', 'https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Armero_tragedy', 'https://es.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nevado_del_Ruiz', 'https://es.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tragedia_de_Armero', 'https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lahar' ] search_results = {} analysis_results = {} print(f'\nStarting web search of {len(initial_urls)} initial sources...') for i, url in enumerate(initial_urls, 1): page_name = url.split('/')[-1].replace('%20', '_') print(f'\n[{i}/{len(initial_urls)}] Fetching: {page_name}') print(f'URL: {url}') try: response = requests.get(url, headers=headers, timeout=30) response.raise_for_status() content = response.text # Simple text extraction using regex to avoid import issues # Remove script and style content content = re.sub(r'<script.*?</script>', '', content, flags=re.DOTALL | re.IGNORECASE) content = re.sub(r'<style.*?</style>', '', content, flags=re.DOTALL | re.IGNORECASE) # Remove HTML tags clean_text = re.sub(r'<[^>]+>', '', content) # Clean up whitespace clean_text = re.sub(r'\s+', ' ', clean_text).strip() search_results[page_name] = { 'url': url, 'content_length': len(clean_text), 'content': clean_text[:25000], # Store first 25000 characters 'fetch_time': datetime.now().isoformat(), 'status': 'success' } print(f'✓ Successfully retrieved {len(clean_text):,} characters') # Analyze content for keywords immediately found_keywords = [] relevant_sections = [] volcanic_events = [] archbishop_mentions = [] content_lower = clean_text.lower() # Look for volcanic event details volcanic_indicators = ['eruption', 'lahar', 'ice cap', 'destabilization', '25%', '30%', 'melting', 'volcanic activity'] for indicator in volcanic_indicators: if indicator in content_lower: # Find sections around indicator start_pos = 0 indicator_count = 0 while True: pos = content_lower.find(indicator, start_pos) if pos == -1: break # Extract context around indicator section_start = max(0, pos - 600) section_end = min(len(clean_text), pos + 600) section = clean_text[section_start:section_end] volcanic_events.append({ 'indicator': indicator, 'section': section, 'position': pos }) start_pos = pos + 1 indicator_count += 1 if indicator_count >= 2: # Limit to 2 occurrences per indicator break # Look for Archbishop and disaster relief mentions religious_indicators = ['archbishop', 'cardinal', 'bishop', 'catholic', 'church', 'relief', 'disaster relief', 'humanitarian'] for indicator in religious_indicators: if indicator in content_lower: start_pos = 0 indicator_count = 0 while True: pos = content_lower.find(indicator, start_pos) if pos == -1: break section_start = max(0, pos - 500) section_end = min(len(clean_text), pos + 500) section = clean_text[section_start:section_end] archbishop_mentions.append({ 'indicator': indicator, 'section': section, 'position': pos }) start_pos = pos + 1 indicator_count += 1 if indicator_count >= 2: # Limit to 2 occurrences per indicator break # Check for search keywords for keyword in search_keywords: if keyword.lower() in content_lower: found_keywords.append(keyword) # Find sections around keyword keyword_lower = keyword.lower() pos = content_lower.find(keyword_lower) if pos != -1: section_start = max(0, pos - 700) section_end = min(len(clean_text), pos + 700) section = clean_text[section_start:section_end] relevant_sections.append({ 'keyword': keyword, 'section': section, 'position': pos }) analysis_results[page_name] = { 'url': url, 'found_keywords': found_keywords, 'relevant_sections': relevant_sections, 'volcanic_events': volcanic_events, 'archbishop_mentions': archbishop_mentions, 'keyword_count': len(found_keywords), 'volcanic_events_count': len(volcanic_events), 'archbishop_mentions_count': len(archbishop_mentions) } print(f'✓ Found {len(found_keywords)} keywords, {len(volcanic_events)} volcanic events, {len(archbishop_mentions)} religious mentions') if found_keywords: keyword_preview = ', '.join(found_keywords[:3]) ellipsis = '...' if len(found_keywords) > 3 else '' print(f'Keywords: {keyword_preview}{ellipsis}') except Exception as e: print(f'✗ Error fetching {url}: {str(e)}') search_results[page_name] = { 'url': url, 'error': str(e), 'content_length': 0, 'content': '', 'fetch_time': datetime.now().isoformat(), 'status': 'error' } analysis_results[page_name] = { 'url': url, 'found_keywords': [], 'relevant_sections': [], 'volcanic_events': [], 'archbishop_mentions': [], 'keyword_count': 0, 'volcanic_events_count': 0, 'archbishop_mentions_count': 0, 'error': str(e) } # Add delay between requests to be respectful time.sleep(2) return search_results, analysis_results # Execute the search print('Starting comprehensive web search for Nevado del Ruiz volcanic event and Archbishop disaster relief...') search_results, analysis_results = search_nevado_del_ruiz_information() print(f'\n{"="*80}') print('INITIAL SEARCH COMPLETED') print(f'{"="*80}') # Save initial search results initial_output_file = 'workspace/nevado_del_ruiz_initial_search.json' with open(initial_output_file, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f: json.dump(analysis_results, f, indent=2, ensure_ascii=False) print(f'\nInitial search results saved to {initial_output_file}') # Generate search summary search_summary = { 'search_date': datetime.now().isoformat(), 'urls_searched': len(search_results), 'successful_fetches': len([r for r in search_results.values() if r.get('status') == 'success']), 'failed_fetches': len([r for r in search_results.values() if r.get('status') == 'error']), 'total_keywords_found': sum(r.get('keyword_count', 0) for r in analysis_results.values()), 'total_volcanic_events': sum(r.get('volcanic_events_count', 0) for r in analysis_results.values()), 'total_archbishop_mentions': sum(r.get('archbishop_mentions_count', 0) for r in analysis_results.values()) } print(f'\nINITIAL SEARCH SUMMARY:') print(f'URLs searched: {search_summary["urls_searched"]}') print(f'Successful fetches: {search_summary["successful_fetches"]}') print(f'Failed fetches: {search_summary["failed_fetches"]}') print(f'Total keywords found: {search_summary["total_keywords_found"]}') print(f'Total volcanic events: {search_summary["total_volcanic_events"]}') print(f'Total Archbishop mentions: {search_summary["total_archbishop_mentions"]}') # Display results by page print(f'\n{"="*80}') print('INITIAL SEARCH RESULTS BY PAGE') print(f'{"="*80}') for page_name, results in analysis_results.items(): if results.get('keyword_count', 0) > 0 or results.get('volcanic_events_count', 0) > 0: print(f'\n📄 {page_name}') print(f' URL: {results["url"]}') if results.get('found_keywords'): keyword_list = ', '.join(results['found_keywords'][:3]) print(f' Keywords found ({results["keyword_count"]}): {keyword_list}') print(f' Volcanic events: {results["volcanic_events_count"]}') print(f' Archbishop mentions: {results["archbishop_mentions_count"]}') elif 'error' in results: print(f'\n❌ {page_name} - Error: {results["error"]}') else: print(f'\n⚪ {page_name} - No relevant content found') print(f'\n{"="*80}') print('ANALYZING CONTENT FOR SPECIFIC VOLCANIC EVENT AND ARCHBISHOP DETAILS') print(f'{"="*80}') # Look for specific patterns related to the volcanic event and Archbishop eruption_details = [] ice_cap_damage = [] archbishop_relief = [] disaster_timeline = [] for page_name, results in analysis_results.items(): # Analyze volcanic events for event in results.get('volcanic_events', []): event_text = event['section'].lower() event_content = event['section'] # Look for 1985 eruption details if '1985' in event_text and ('eruption' in event_text or 'lahar' in event_text): eruption_details.append({ 'source': page_name, 'section': event_content, 'indicator': event['indicator'], 'url': results['url'] }) # Look for ice cap damage percentages if any(term in event_text for term in ['25%', '30%', 'ice cap', 'destabilization', 'melting']): ice_cap_damage.append({ 'source': page_name, 'section': event_content, 'indicator': event['indicator'], 'url': results['url'] }) # Analyze Archbishop mentions for mention in results.get('archbishop_mentions', []): mention_text = mention['section'].lower() mention_content = mention['section'] # Look for disaster relief activities if any(term in mention_text for term in ['relief', 'disaster', 'humanitarian', 'aid', 'help']): archbishop_relief.append({ 'source': page_name, 'section': mention_content, 'indicator': mention['indicator'], 'url': results['url'] }) # Look for timeline information if any(term in mention_text for term in ['1985', 'november', 'armero', 'nevado']): disaster_timeline.append({ 'source': page_name, 'section': mention_content, 'indicator': mention['indicator'], 'url': results['url'] }) # Display findings print(f'\n🌋 ERUPTION DETAILS: {len(eruption_details)}') for i, detail in enumerate(eruption_details[:3], 1): print(f'\n{i}. From {detail["source"]}: ({detail["indicator"]})') print(f' {detail["section"][:400]}...') print(f'\n🧊 ICE CAP DAMAGE: {len(ice_cap_damage)}') for i, damage in enumerate(ice_cap_damage[:3], 1): print(f'\n{i}. From {damage["source"]}: ({damage["indicator"]})') print(f' {damage["section"][:400]}...') print(f'\n⛪ ARCHBISHOP RELIEF: {len(archbishop_relief)}') for i, relief in enumerate(archbishop_relief[:3], 1): print(f'\n{i}. From {relief["source"]}: ({relief["indicator"]})') print(f' {relief["section"][:400]}...') print(f'\n📅 DISASTER TIMELINE: {len(disaster_timeline)}') for i, timeline in enumerate(disaster_timeline[:3], 1): print(f'\n{i}. From {timeline["source"]}: ({timeline["indicator"]})') print(f' {timeline["section"][:400]}...') # Save comprehensive findings comprehensive_findings = { 'search_date': datetime.now().isoformat(), 'search_summary': search_summary, 'eruption_details': eruption_details, 'ice_cap_damage': ice_cap_damage, 'archbishop_relief': archbishop_relief, 'disaster_timeline': disaster_timeline, 'search_keywords': search_keywords, 'pages_analyzed': list(analysis_results.keys()) } findings_file = 'workspace/nevado_del_ruiz_comprehensive_findings.json' with open(findings_file, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f: json.dump(comprehensive_findings, f, indent=2, ensure_ascii=False) print(f'\nComprehensive findings saved to {findings_file}') print(f'\n{"="*80}') print('INITIAL SEARCH PHASE COMPLETED - ANALYZING KEY FINDINGS') print(f'{"="*80}') print(f'\n📊 Initial Search Statistics:') print(f' • Pages searched: {len(analysis_results)}') print(f' • Eruption details found: {len(eruption_details)}') print(f' • Ice cap damage references: {len(ice_cap_damage)}') print(f' • Archbishop relief mentions: {len(archbishop_relief)}') print(f' • Timeline references: {len(disaster_timeline)}') print(f'\n🎯 KEY FINDINGS PREVIEW:') if eruption_details: print(f' • Volcanic eruption information identified') if ice_cap_damage: print(f' • Ice cap destabilization data found') if archbishop_relief: print(f' • Archbishop disaster relief activities documented') if disaster_timeline: print(f' • Timeline information available') print(f'\n✅ INITIAL SEARCH COMPLETED SUCCESSFULLY!') print(f'\n📁 FILES CREATED:') print(f' • {initial_output_file} (Raw search analysis)') print(f' • {findings_file} (Comprehensive findings)')
Execution Output
Code Output: === SEARCHING FOR NEVADO DEL RUIZ VOLCANIC EVENT AND ARCHBISHOP DISASTER RELIEF === Objective: Identify volcanic event causing 25-30% ice cap destabilization Focus: Specific disaster, timing, and Archbishop leading relief efforts ================================================================================ Search will focus on 10 key terms related to Nevado del Ruiz volcanic events Starting comprehensive web search for Nevado del Ruiz volcanic event and Archbishop disaster relief... Starting web search of 6 initial sources... [1/6] Fetching: Nevado_del_Ruiz URL: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nevado_del_Ruiz ✗ Error fetching https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nevado_del_Ruiz: module 'datetime' has no attribute 'now' Execution error: AttributeError: module 'datetime' has no attribute 'now' Error/Warning: Traceback (most recent call last): File "<string>", line 81, in search_nevado_del_ruiz_information AttributeError: module 'datetime' has no attribute 'now' During handling of the above exception, another exception occurred: Traceback (most recent call last): File "/Users/xushiyue.6/codes/EvolAgent/src/utils/interpreter.py", line 367, in interpret_code exec(code, execution_globals, {}) # 使用独立的 locals ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ File "<string>", line 214, in <module> File "<string>", line 192, in search_nevado_del_ruiz_information AttributeError: module 'datetime' has no attribute 'now'
tester
2025-08-13 00:27:57
Tester Feedback
Tester Feedback:
Execution failed - NameError: name 'dt' is not defined. The code attempted to import datetime with alias 'dt' using 'from datetime import datetime as dt', but then tried to use 'dt.now()' which failed because 'dt' was not properly defined in the execution scope. The web search for Nevado del Ruiz volcanic event information never started due to this import alias issue on the first URL fetch. **PLAN** alignment: 0% - no volcanic event data retrieved, no ice cap destabilization information found, and no Archbishop disaster relief details obtained. Recommended fix: Change the import to 'import datetime' and use 'datetime.datetime.now()', or fix the alias by ensuring 'from datetime import datetime as dt' works properly in the execution environment. The search approach targeting Wikipedia sources about the 1985 Armero tragedy and Nevado del Ruiz eruption is appropriate for finding the required information about the volcanic event that caused 25-30% ice cap destabilization and identifying the Archbishop who led relief efforts.
Python Code python
import requests import json import os import time import re from datetime import datetime print('=== SEARCHING FOR NEVADO DEL RUIZ VOLCANIC EVENT AND ARCHBISHOP DISASTER RELIEF ===') print('Objective: Identify volcanic event causing 25-30% ice cap destabilization') print('Focus: Specific disaster, timing, and Archbishop leading relief efforts') print('=' * 80) # Create workspace directory if it doesn't exist if not os.path.exists('workspace'): os.makedirs('workspace') print('Created workspace directory') # Define comprehensive search keywords focusing on Nevado del Ruiz volcanic events search_keywords = [ 'Nevado del Ruiz volcanic eruption ice cap destabilization', 'Nevado del Ruiz 1985 eruption lahar disaster', 'Armero tragedy Nevado del Ruiz volcano', 'Nevado del Ruiz ice cap melting volcanic event', 'Archbishop disaster relief Nevado del Ruiz', 'Catholic Church Armero disaster relief', 'Nevado del Ruiz volcanic activity Colombia', 'lahar Nevado del Ruiz ice cap damage', 'volcanic eruption Colombia 1985 Archbishop', 'Nevado del Ruiz geological event ice destabilization' ] print(f'Search will focus on {len(search_keywords)} key terms related to Nevado del Ruiz volcanic events') def search_nevado_del_ruiz_information(): """Search for Nevado del Ruiz volcanic event and Archbishop disaster relief information""" # Headers for web requests headers = { 'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/91.0.4472.124 Safari/537.36', 'Accept-Language': 'en-US,en;q=0.9,es;q=0.8' } # Initial URLs to search - focusing on volcanic disaster and Colombian sources initial_urls = [ 'https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nevado_del_Ruiz', 'https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1985_Armero_tragedy', 'https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Armero_tragedy', 'https://es.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nevado_del_Ruiz', 'https://es.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tragedia_de_Armero', 'https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lahar' ] search_results = {} analysis_results = {} print(f'\nStarting web search of {len(initial_urls)} initial sources...') for i, url in enumerate(initial_urls, 1): page_name = url.split('/')[-1].replace('%20', '_') print(f'\n[{i}/{len(initial_urls)}] Fetching: {page_name}') print(f'URL: {url}') try: response = requests.get(url, headers=headers, timeout=30) response.raise_for_status() content = response.text # Simple text extraction using regex to avoid import issues # Remove script and style content content = re.sub(r'<script.*?</script>', '', content, flags=re.DOTALL | re.IGNORECASE) content = re.sub(r'<style.*?</style>', '', content, flags=re.DOTALL | re.IGNORECASE) # Remove HTML tags clean_text = re.sub(r'<[^>]+>', '', content) # Clean up whitespace clean_text = re.sub(r'\s+', ' ', clean_text).strip() search_results[page_name] = { 'url': url, 'content_length': len(clean_text), 'content': clean_text[:25000], # Store first 25000 characters 'fetch_time': datetime.now().isoformat(), 'status': 'success' } print(f'✓ Successfully retrieved {len(clean_text):,} characters') # Analyze content for keywords immediately found_keywords = [] relevant_sections = [] volcanic_events = [] archbishop_mentions = [] content_lower = clean_text.lower() # Look for volcanic event details volcanic_indicators = ['eruption', 'lahar', 'ice cap', 'destabilization', '25%', '30%', 'melting', 'volcanic activity'] for indicator in volcanic_indicators: if indicator in content_lower: # Find sections around indicator start_pos = 0 indicator_count = 0 while True: pos = content_lower.find(indicator, start_pos) if pos == -1: break # Extract context around indicator section_start = max(0, pos - 600) section_end = min(len(clean_text), pos + 600) section = clean_text[section_start:section_end] volcanic_events.append({ 'indicator': indicator, 'section': section, 'position': pos }) start_pos = pos + 1 indicator_count += 1 if indicator_count >= 2: # Limit to 2 occurrences per indicator break # Look for Archbishop and disaster relief mentions religious_indicators = ['archbishop', 'cardinal', 'bishop', 'catholic', 'church', 'relief', 'disaster relief', 'humanitarian'] for indicator in religious_indicators: if indicator in content_lower: start_pos = 0 indicator_count = 0 while True: pos = content_lower.find(indicator, start_pos) if pos == -1: break section_start = max(0, pos - 500) section_end = min(len(clean_text), pos + 500) section = clean_text[section_start:section_end] archbishop_mentions.append({ 'indicator': indicator, 'section': section, 'position': pos }) start_pos = pos + 1 indicator_count += 1 if indicator_count >= 2: # Limit to 2 occurrences per indicator break # Check for search keywords for keyword in search_keywords: if keyword.lower() in content_lower: found_keywords.append(keyword) # Find sections around keyword keyword_lower = keyword.lower() pos = content_lower.find(keyword_lower) if pos != -1: section_start = max(0, pos - 700) section_end = min(len(clean_text), pos + 700) section = clean_text[section_start:section_end] relevant_sections.append({ 'keyword': keyword, 'section': section, 'position': pos }) analysis_results[page_name] = { 'url': url, 'found_keywords': found_keywords, 'relevant_sections': relevant_sections, 'volcanic_events': volcanic_events, 'archbishop_mentions': archbishop_mentions, 'keyword_count': len(found_keywords), 'volcanic_events_count': len(volcanic_events), 'archbishop_mentions_count': len(archbishop_mentions) } print(f'✓ Found {len(found_keywords)} keywords, {len(volcanic_events)} volcanic events, {len(archbishop_mentions)} religious mentions') if found_keywords: keyword_preview = ', '.join(found_keywords[:3]) ellipsis = '...' if len(found_keywords) > 3 else '' print(f'Keywords: {keyword_preview}{ellipsis}') except Exception as e: print(f'✗ Error fetching {url}: {str(e)}') search_results[page_name] = { 'url': url, 'error': str(e), 'content_length': 0, 'content': '', 'fetch_time': datetime.now().isoformat(), 'status': 'error' } analysis_results[page_name] = { 'url': url, 'found_keywords': [], 'relevant_sections': [], 'volcanic_events': [], 'archbishop_mentions': [], 'keyword_count': 0, 'volcanic_events_count': 0, 'archbishop_mentions_count': 0, 'error': str(e) } # Add delay between requests to be respectful time.sleep(2) return search_results, analysis_results # Execute the search print('Starting comprehensive web search for Nevado del Ruiz volcanic event and Archbishop disaster relief...') search_results, analysis_results = search_nevado_del_ruiz_information() print(f'\n{"="*80}') print('INITIAL SEARCH COMPLETED') print(f'{"="*80}') # Save initial search results initial_output_file = 'workspace/nevado_del_ruiz_initial_search.json' with open(initial_output_file, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f: json.dump(analysis_results, f, indent=2, ensure_ascii=False) print(f'\nInitial search results saved to {initial_output_file}') # Generate search summary search_summary = { 'search_date': datetime.now().isoformat(), 'urls_searched': len(search_results), 'successful_fetches': len([r for r in search_results.values() if r.get('status') == 'success']), 'failed_fetches': len([r for r in search_results.values() if r.get('status') == 'error']), 'total_keywords_found': sum(r.get('keyword_count', 0) for r in analysis_results.values()), 'total_volcanic_events': sum(r.get('volcanic_events_count', 0) for r in analysis_results.values()), 'total_archbishop_mentions': sum(r.get('archbishop_mentions_count', 0) for r in analysis_results.values()) } print(f'\nINITIAL SEARCH SUMMARY:') print(f'URLs searched: {search_summary["urls_searched"]}') print(f'Successful fetches: {search_summary["successful_fetches"]}') print(f'Failed fetches: {search_summary["failed_fetches"]}') print(f'Total keywords found: {search_summary["total_keywords_found"]}') print(f'Total volcanic events: {search_summary["total_volcanic_events"]}') print(f'Total Archbishop mentions: {search_summary["total_archbishop_mentions"]}') # Display results by page print(f'\n{"="*80}') print('INITIAL SEARCH RESULTS BY PAGE') print(f'{"="*80}') for page_name, results in analysis_results.items(): if results.get('keyword_count', 0) > 0 or results.get('volcanic_events_count', 0) > 0: print(f'\n📄 {page_name}') print(f' URL: {results["url"]}') if results.get('found_keywords'): keyword_list = ', '.join(results['found_keywords'][:3]) print(f' Keywords found ({results["keyword_count"]}): {keyword_list}') print(f' Volcanic events: {results["volcanic_events_count"]}') print(f' Archbishop mentions: {results["archbishop_mentions_count"]}') elif 'error' in results: print(f'\n❌ {page_name} - Error: {results["error"]}') else: print(f'\n⚪ {page_name} - No relevant content found') print(f'\n{"="*80}') print('ANALYZING CONTENT FOR SPECIFIC VOLCANIC EVENT AND ARCHBISHOP DETAILS') print(f'{"="*80}') # Look for specific patterns related to the volcanic event and Archbishop eruption_details = [] ice_cap_damage = [] archbishop_relief = [] disaster_timeline = [] for page_name, results in analysis_results.items(): # Analyze volcanic events for event in results.get('volcanic_events', []): event_text = event['section'].lower() event_content = event['section'] # Look for 1985 eruption details if '1985' in event_text and ('eruption' in event_text or 'lahar' in event_text): eruption_details.append({ 'source': page_name, 'section': event_content, 'indicator': event['indicator'], 'url': results['url'] }) # Look for ice cap damage percentages if any(term in event_text for term in ['25%', '30%', 'ice cap', 'destabilization', 'melting']): ice_cap_damage.append({ 'source': page_name, 'section': event_content, 'indicator': event['indicator'], 'url': results['url'] }) # Analyze Archbishop mentions for mention in results.get('archbishop_mentions', []): mention_text = mention['section'].lower() mention_content = mention['section'] # Look for disaster relief activities if any(term in mention_text for term in ['relief', 'disaster', 'humanitarian', 'aid', 'help']): archbishop_relief.append({ 'source': page_name, 'section': mention_content, 'indicator': mention['indicator'], 'url': results['url'] }) # Look for timeline information if any(term in mention_text for term in ['1985', 'november', 'armero', 'nevado']): disaster_timeline.append({ 'source': page_name, 'section': mention_content, 'indicator': mention['indicator'], 'url': results['url'] }) # Display findings print(f'\n🌋 ERUPTION DETAILS: {len(eruption_details)}') for i, detail in enumerate(eruption_details[:3], 1): print(f'\n{i}. From {detail["source"]}: ({detail["indicator"]})') print(f' {detail["section"][:400]}...') print(f'\n🧊 ICE CAP DAMAGE: {len(ice_cap_damage)}') for i, damage in enumerate(ice_cap_damage[:3], 1): print(f'\n{i}. From {damage["source"]}: ({damage["indicator"]})') print(f' {damage["section"][:400]}...') print(f'\n⛪ ARCHBISHOP RELIEF: {len(archbishop_relief)}') for i, relief in enumerate(archbishop_relief[:3], 1): print(f'\n{i}. From {relief["source"]}: ({relief["indicator"]})') print(f' {relief["section"][:400]}...') print(f'\n📅 DISASTER TIMELINE: {len(disaster_timeline)}') for i, timeline in enumerate(disaster_timeline[:3], 1): print(f'\n{i}. From {timeline["source"]}: ({timeline["indicator"]})') print(f' {timeline["section"][:400]}...') # Save comprehensive findings comprehensive_findings = { 'search_date': datetime.now().isoformat(), 'search_summary': search_summary, 'eruption_details': eruption_details, 'ice_cap_damage': ice_cap_damage, 'archbishop_relief': archbishop_relief, 'disaster_timeline': disaster_timeline, 'search_keywords': search_keywords, 'pages_analyzed': list(analysis_results.keys()) } findings_file = 'workspace/nevado_del_ruiz_comprehensive_findings.json' with open(findings_file, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f: json.dump(comprehensive_findings, f, indent=2, ensure_ascii=False) print(f'\nComprehensive findings saved to {findings_file}') print(f'\n{"="*80}') print('INITIAL SEARCH PHASE COMPLETED - ANALYZING KEY FINDINGS') print(f'{"="*80}') print(f'\n📊 Initial Search Statistics:') print(f' • Pages searched: {len(analysis_results)}') print(f' • Eruption details found: {len(eruption_details)}') print(f' • Ice cap damage references: {len(ice_cap_damage)}') print(f' • Archbishop relief mentions: {len(archbishop_relief)}') print(f' • Timeline references: {len(disaster_timeline)}') print(f'\n🎯 KEY FINDINGS PREVIEW:') if eruption_details: print(f' • Volcanic eruption information identified') if ice_cap_damage: print(f' • Ice cap destabilization data found') if archbishop_relief: print(f' • Archbishop disaster relief activities documented') if disaster_timeline: print(f' • Timeline information available') print(f'\n✅ INITIAL SEARCH COMPLETED SUCCESSFULLY!') print(f'\n📁 FILES CREATED:') print(f' • {initial_output_file} (Raw search analysis)') print(f' • {findings_file} (Comprehensive findings)')
Execution Output
Code Output: === SEARCHING FOR NEVADO DEL RUIZ VOLCANIC EVENT AND ARCHBISHOP DISASTER RELIEF === Objective: Identify volcanic event causing 25-30% ice cap destabilization Focus: Specific disaster, timing, and Archbishop leading relief efforts ================================================================================ Search will focus on 10 key terms related to Nevado del Ruiz volcanic events Starting comprehensive web search for Nevado del Ruiz volcanic event and Archbishop disaster relief... Starting web search of 6 initial sources... [1/6] Fetching: Nevado_del_Ruiz URL: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nevado_del_Ruiz ✗ Error fetching https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nevado_del_Ruiz: module 'datetime' has no attribute 'now' Execution error: AttributeError: module 'datetime' has no attribute 'now' Error/Warning: Traceback (most recent call last): File "<string>", line 81, in search_nevado_del_ruiz_information AttributeError: module 'datetime' has no attribute 'now' During handling of the above exception, another exception occurred: Traceback (most recent call last): File "/Users/xushiyue.6/codes/EvolAgent/src/utils/interpreter.py", line 367, in interpret_code exec(code, execution_globals, {}) # 使用独立的 locals ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ File "<string>", line 214, in <module> File "<string>", line 192, in search_nevado_del_ruiz_information AttributeError: module 'datetime' has no attribute 'now'
developer
2025-08-13 00:29:13
Code Execution - Plan #1 (Iteration 7)
Executing development phase code:
Python Code python
import requests import json import os import time import re print('=== SEARCHING FOR NEVADO DEL RUIZ VOLCANIC EVENT AND ARCHBISHOP DISASTER RELIEF ===') print('Objective: Identify volcanic event causing 25-30% ice cap destabilization') print('Focus: Specific disaster, timing, and Archbishop leading relief efforts') print('=' * 80) # Create workspace directory if it doesn't exist if not os.path.exists('workspace'): os.makedirs('workspace') print('Created workspace directory') # Define comprehensive search keywords focusing on Nevado del Ruiz volcanic events search_keywords = [ 'Nevado del Ruiz volcanic eruption ice cap destabilization', 'Nevado del Ruiz 1985 eruption lahar disaster', 'Armero tragedy Nevado del Ruiz volcano', 'Nevado del Ruiz ice cap melting volcanic event', 'Archbishop disaster relief Nevado del Ruiz', 'Catholic Church Armero disaster relief', 'Nevado del Ruiz volcanic activity Colombia', 'lahar Nevado del Ruiz ice cap damage', 'volcanic eruption Colombia 1985 Archbishop', 'Nevado del Ruiz geological event ice destabilization' ] print(f'Search will focus on {len(search_keywords)} key terms related to Nevado del Ruiz volcanic events') def get_current_timestamp(): """Get current timestamp as string to avoid datetime import issues""" return str(int(time.time())) def search_nevado_del_ruiz_information(): """Search for Nevado del Ruiz volcanic event and Archbishop disaster relief information""" # Headers for web requests headers = { 'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/91.0.4472.124 Safari/537.36', 'Accept-Language': 'en-US,en;q=0.9,es;q=0.8' } # Initial URLs to search - focusing on volcanic disaster and Colombian sources initial_urls = [ 'https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nevado_del_Ruiz', 'https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1985_Armero_tragedy', 'https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Armero_tragedy', 'https://es.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nevado_del_Ruiz', 'https://es.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tragedia_de_Armero', 'https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lahar' ] search_results = {} analysis_results = {} print(f'\nStarting web search of {len(initial_urls)} initial sources...') for i, url in enumerate(initial_urls, 1): page_name = url.split('/')[-1].replace('%20', '_') print(f'\n[{i}/{len(initial_urls)}] Fetching: {page_name}') print(f'URL: {url}') try: response = requests.get(url, headers=headers, timeout=30) response.raise_for_status() content = response.text # Simple text extraction using regex to avoid import issues # Remove script and style content content = re.sub(r'<script.*?</script>', '', content, flags=re.DOTALL | re.IGNORECASE) content = re.sub(r'<style.*?</style>', '', content, flags=re.DOTALL | re.IGNORECASE) # Remove HTML tags clean_text = re.sub(r'<[^>]+>', '', content) # Clean up whitespace clean_text = re.sub(r'\s+', ' ', clean_text).strip() search_results[page_name] = { 'url': url, 'content_length': len(clean_text), 'content': clean_text[:25000], # Store first 25000 characters 'fetch_time': get_current_timestamp(), 'status': 'success' } print(f'✓ Successfully retrieved {len(clean_text):,} characters') # Analyze content for keywords immediately found_keywords = [] relevant_sections = [] volcanic_events = [] archbishop_mentions = [] content_lower = clean_text.lower() # Look for volcanic event details volcanic_indicators = ['eruption', 'lahar', 'ice cap', 'destabilization', '25%', '30%', 'melting', 'volcanic activity'] for indicator in volcanic_indicators: if indicator in content_lower: # Find sections around indicator start_pos = 0 indicator_count = 0 while True: pos = content_lower.find(indicator, start_pos) if pos == -1: break # Extract context around indicator section_start = max(0, pos - 600) section_end = min(len(clean_text), pos + 600) section = clean_text[section_start:section_end] volcanic_events.append({ 'indicator': indicator, 'section': section, 'position': pos }) start_pos = pos + 1 indicator_count += 1 if indicator_count >= 2: # Limit to 2 occurrences per indicator break # Look for Archbishop and disaster relief mentions religious_indicators = ['archbishop', 'cardinal', 'bishop', 'catholic', 'church', 'relief', 'disaster relief', 'humanitarian'] for indicator in religious_indicators: if indicator in content_lower: start_pos = 0 indicator_count = 0 while True: pos = content_lower.find(indicator, start_pos) if pos == -1: break section_start = max(0, pos - 500) section_end = min(len(clean_text), pos + 500) section = clean_text[section_start:section_end] archbishop_mentions.append({ 'indicator': indicator, 'section': section, 'position': pos }) start_pos = pos + 1 indicator_count += 1 if indicator_count >= 2: # Limit to 2 occurrences per indicator break # Check for search keywords for keyword in search_keywords: if keyword.lower() in content_lower: found_keywords.append(keyword) # Find sections around keyword keyword_lower = keyword.lower() pos = content_lower.find(keyword_lower) if pos != -1: section_start = max(0, pos - 700) section_end = min(len(clean_text), pos + 700) section = clean_text[section_start:section_end] relevant_sections.append({ 'keyword': keyword, 'section': section, 'position': pos }) analysis_results[page_name] = { 'url': url, 'found_keywords': found_keywords, 'relevant_sections': relevant_sections, 'volcanic_events': volcanic_events, 'archbishop_mentions': archbishop_mentions, 'keyword_count': len(found_keywords), 'volcanic_events_count': len(volcanic_events), 'archbishop_mentions_count': len(archbishop_mentions) } print(f'✓ Found {len(found_keywords)} keywords, {len(volcanic_events)} volcanic events, {len(archbishop_mentions)} religious mentions') if found_keywords: keyword_preview = ', '.join(found_keywords[:3]) ellipsis = '...' if len(found_keywords) > 3 else '' print(f'Keywords: {keyword_preview}{ellipsis}') except Exception as e: print(f'✗ Error fetching {url}: {str(e)}') search_results[page_name] = { 'url': url, 'error': str(e), 'content_length': 0, 'content': '', 'fetch_time': get_current_timestamp(), 'status': 'error' } analysis_results[page_name] = { 'url': url, 'found_keywords': [], 'relevant_sections': [], 'volcanic_events': [], 'archbishop_mentions': [], 'keyword_count': 0, 'volcanic_events_count': 0, 'archbishop_mentions_count': 0, 'error': str(e) } # Add delay between requests to be respectful time.sleep(2) return search_results, analysis_results # Execute the search print('Starting comprehensive web search for Nevado del Ruiz volcanic event and Archbishop disaster relief...') search_results, analysis_results = search_nevado_del_ruiz_information() print(f'\n{"="*80}') print('INITIAL SEARCH COMPLETED') print(f'{">="*80}') # Save initial search results initial_output_file = 'workspace/nevado_del_ruiz_initial_search.json' with open(initial_output_file, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f: json.dump(analysis_results, f, indent=2, ensure_ascii=False) print(f'\nInitial search results saved to {initial_output_file}') # Generate search summary search_summary = { 'search_timestamp': get_current_timestamp(), 'urls_searched': len(search_results), 'successful_fetches': len([r for r in search_results.values() if r.get('status') == 'success']), 'failed_fetches': len([r for r in search_results.values() if r.get('status') == 'error']), 'total_keywords_found': sum(r.get('keyword_count', 0) for r in analysis_results.values()), 'total_volcanic_events': sum(r.get('volcanic_events_count', 0) for r in analysis_results.values()), 'total_archbishop_mentions': sum(r.get('archbishop_mentions_count', 0) for r in analysis_results.values()) } print(f'\nINITIAL SEARCH SUMMARY:') print(f'URLs searched: {search_summary["urls_searched"]}') print(f'Successful fetches: {search_summary["successful_fetches"]}') print(f'Failed fetches: {search_summary["failed_fetches"]}') print(f'Total keywords found: {search_summary["total_keywords_found"]}') print(f'Total volcanic events: {search_summary["total_volcanic_events"]}') print(f'Total Archbishop mentions: {search_summary["total_archbishop_mentions"]}') # Display results by page print(f'\n{"="*80}') print('INITIAL SEARCH RESULTS BY PAGE') print(f'{">="*80}') for page_name, results in analysis_results.items(): if results.get('keyword_count', 0) > 0 or results.get('volcanic_events_count', 0) > 0: print(f'\n📄 {page_name}') print(f' URL: {results["url"]}') if results.get('found_keywords'): keyword_list = ', '.join(results['found_keywords'][:3]) print(f' Keywords found ({results["keyword_count"]}): {keyword_list}') print(f' Volcanic events: {results["volcanic_events_count"]}') print(f' Archbishop mentions: {results["archbishop_mentions_count"]}') elif 'error' in results: print(f'\n❌ {page_name} - Error: {results["error"]}') else: print(f'\n⚪ {page_name} - No relevant content found') print(f'\n{"="*80}') print('ANALYZING CONTENT FOR SPECIFIC VOLCANIC EVENT AND ARCHBISHOP DETAILS') print(f'{">="*80}') # Look for specific patterns related to the volcanic event and Archbishop eruption_details = [] ice_cap_damage = [] archbishop_relief = [] disaster_timeline = [] for page_name, results in analysis_results.items(): # Analyze volcanic events for event in results.get('volcanic_events', []): event_text = event['section'].lower() event_content = event['section'] # Look for 1985 eruption details if '1985' in event_text and ('eruption' in event_text or 'lahar' in event_text): eruption_details.append({ 'source': page_name, 'section': event_content, 'indicator': event['indicator'], 'url': results['url'] }) # Look for ice cap damage percentages if any(term in event_text for term in ['25%', '30%', 'ice cap', 'destabilization', 'melting']): ice_cap_damage.append({ 'source': page_name, 'section': event_content, 'indicator': event['indicator'], 'url': results['url'] }) # Analyze Archbishop mentions for mention in results.get('archbishop_mentions', []): mention_text = mention['section'].lower() mention_content = mention['section'] # Look for disaster relief activities if any(term in mention_text for term in ['relief', 'disaster', 'humanitarian', 'aid', 'help']): archbishop_relief.append({ 'source': page_name, 'section': mention_content, 'indicator': mention['indicator'], 'url': results['url'] }) # Look for timeline information if any(term in mention_text for term in ['1985', 'november', 'armero', 'nevado']): disaster_timeline.append({ 'source': page_name, 'section': mention_content, 'indicator': mention['indicator'], 'url': results['url'] }) # Display findings print(f'\n🌋 ERUPTION DETAILS: {len(eruption_details)}') for i, detail in enumerate(eruption_details[:3], 1): print(f'\n{i}. From {detail["source"]}: ({detail["indicator"]})') print(f' {detail["section"][:400]}...') print(f'\n🧊 ICE CAP DAMAGE: {len(ice_cap_damage)}') for i, damage in enumerate(ice_cap_damage[:3], 1): print(f'\n{i}. From {damage["source"]}: ({damage["indicator"]})') print(f' {damage["section"][:400]}...') print(f'\n⛪ ARCHBISHOP RELIEF: {len(archbishop_relief)}') for i, relief in enumerate(archbishop_relief[:3], 1): print(f'\n{i}. From {relief["source"]}: ({relief["indicator"]})') print(f' {relief["section"][:400]}...') print(f'\n📅 DISASTER TIMELINE: {len(disaster_timeline)}') for i, timeline in enumerate(disaster_timeline[:3], 1): print(f'\n{i}. From {timeline["source"]}: ({timeline["indicator"]})') print(f' {timeline["section"][:400]}...') # Save comprehensive findings comprehensive_findings = { 'search_timestamp': get_current_timestamp(), 'search_summary': search_summary, 'eruption_details': eruption_details, 'ice_cap_damage': ice_cap_damage, 'archbishop_relief': archbishop_relief, 'disaster_timeline': disaster_timeline, 'search_keywords': search_keywords, 'pages_analyzed': list(analysis_results.keys()) } findings_file = 'workspace/nevado_del_ruiz_comprehensive_findings.json' with open(findings_file, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f: json.dump(comprehensive_findings, f, indent=2, ensure_ascii=False) print(f'\nComprehensive findings saved to {findings_file}') print(f'\n{"="*80}') print('INITIAL SEARCH PHASE COMPLETED - ANALYZING KEY FINDINGS') print(f'{">="*80}') print(f'\n📊 Initial Search Statistics:') print(f' • Pages searched: {len(analysis_results)}') print(f' • Eruption details found: {len(eruption_details)}') print(f' • Ice cap damage references: {len(ice_cap_damage)}') print(f' • Archbishop relief mentions: {len(archbishop_relief)}') print(f' • Timeline references: {len(disaster_timeline)}') print(f'\n🎯 KEY FINDINGS PREVIEW:') if eruption_details: print(f' • Volcanic eruption information identified') if ice_cap_damage: print(f' • Ice cap destabilization data found') if archbishop_relief: print(f' • Archbishop disaster relief activities documented') if disaster_timeline: print(f' • Timeline information available') print(f'\n✅ INITIAL SEARCH COMPLETED SUCCESSFULLY!') print(f'\n📁 FILES CREATED:') print(f' • {initial_output_file} (Raw search analysis)') print(f' • {findings_file} (Comprehensive findings)')
